description:
With longer pins, you either have to find a deep enough placement or tie them off short. The shorter length of the Knifeblades gives you hassle-free protection for these shallower placements, while their profile fits them into the most incipient cracks.

  • Hard, durable chrome-moly steel
  • Lightening hole doubles as second clip-in option
  • Stamped, bent, then ground into specific thickness
  • Numbered for identification
name: Black Diamond Knifeblade Piton
